titles.title: Jesus What Can I Give What Can I Bring

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will offer up my life
In spirit and truth
Pouring out the oil of love,
as my worship to You
in surrender I must give
my every part
lord, receive the sacrifice
of a broken heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, what can I give, what can I bring
to so faithful a Friend,
to so loving a King?
Savior, what can be said,
what can be sung?
as a praise of Your name,
for the things You have done?
oh my words could not tell, not even in part,
of the debt of love that is owed by this thankful heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You deserve my every breath
for You've paid the great cost
Giving up your life to death, even death on a cross
You took all my shame away,
There defeated my sin
Opened up the gates of heav'n,
and have beckoned me in
